#summary Version Information Component documentation.

= Version Information Component =

This project contains one unit - _PJVersionInfo_. This unit implements the _[TPJVersionInfo TPJVersionInfo]_ version information resource reader component. It also defines the _[TPJVersionNumber TPJVersionNumber]_ record that stores version numbers as four discreet values.
